title: ISA instructions
content: all the details for ISA 1 please( like carry black pen only )

comments.body: Bring black pens, pencil (optional), transparent water bottle if you need and most importantly ID Card and Calculator!
Don't forget to write only one question in a page , and bubble the question number on top of the page . Last year I did this mistake and lost marks
Along with the calculator, also make sure to know *how to use* it. So many used to turn up to our tests and struggle to find certain modes
oh yeah this happened to me for the avions club test, i got my first scientific calculator on that very day and i could not figure out how to get answers in decimal format instead of fractions üò≠
Ik I'm very late but what about the subsequent pages of the same answer? I forgot to mark them, am i cooked? üò≠üôè
The papers would have been checked till now , can't say anything
